name: Amazing Spool Up Sound! British Airways 787-8 [G-ZBJA] Night Takeoff from Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
Turn your speakers up all the way! I must say, I do miss the BA 767s a bit less now! Here is British Airways' first 787 departing Calgary on its flight back to London-Heathrow, with a phenomenal spool up sound! I am also very impressed with my new camera, this was the first night video I filmed with it and it turned out very well! I hope you guys enjoy.

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

Aircraft Name: None

Engines: 2x RR Trent 1000
Registration: G-ZBJA
Route: YYC-LHR 
Callsign: Speedbird 102 Heavy
Runway used: 35L
Taxiway(s) used: K, C
